what: Get diagnostics from position data — get_diagnostics
title: Get diagnostics from position data — get_diagnostics
text: Get diagnostics position data

title: Get diagnostics from position data — get_diagnostics
Get diagnostics from position data — get_diagnostics
text: pos_data data frame containing position data POSIXct date_time column position measurements empty dataframe. acc_data data frame containing acceleration data, used fallback empt pos_data provided

title: Get diagnostics from position data — get_diagnostics
text: data frame containing diagnostics information deployment length, number positions, statistics satellite counts accuracy. empty dataframe provided, largely NA.

title: Get diagnostics from position data — get_diagnostics

what: Get all files for a specific tag — get_tag_files
title: Get all files for a specific tag — get_tag_files
text: Get files specific tag

title: Get all files for a specific tag — get_tag_files
Get all files for a specific tag — get_tag_files
text: tag_id ID tag retrieve files . target_file_path path directory containing tag files. Alternatively, can provide vector file names directly using file_paths parameter. file_paths vector file names search specified tag ID.

title: Get all files for a specific tag — get_tag_files
text: vector file paths associated specified tag ID.

title: Get all files for a specific tag — get_tag_files

what: Read all data from an archive or folder — load_all_gps_data
title: Read all data from an archive or folder — load_all_gps_data
text: Given folder path archive path, function reads tag data files returns list data frames tag, including acceleration data (without immersion), position data, diagnostics.

title: Read all data from an archive or folder — load_all_gps_data
Read all data from an archive or folder — load_all_gps_data
text: folder_path path folder containing tag data files (applicable). archive_path path archive file (applicable).

title: Read all data from an archive or folder — load_all_gps_data
text: list lists, containing data frames specific tag: acc_immersion_data: data frame containing acceleration data immersion information. acc_data: data frame containing acceleration data without immersion information. pos_data: data frame containing position data. diag_data: data frame containing diagnostics information. root_folders: vector filepaths tag data loaded. base_path: folder_path archive_path used load files.

title: Read all data from an archive or folder — load_all_gps_data
code: load_all_data(folder_path = "path/to/directory") # Load data from a folder #> Error in load_all_data(folder_path = "path/to/directory"): could not find function "load_all_data" load_all_data(archive_path = "path/to/archive.zip") # Load data from an archive #> Error in load_all_data(archive_path = "path/to/archive.zip"): could not find function "load_all_data"

title: Load acceleration data for a specific tag — load_tag_acc_data
code: load_tag_acc_data(tag_id, tag_files, archive_path = NULL, immersion = TRUE)

title: Load acceleration data for a specific tag — load_tag_acc_data
text: tag_id ID tag retrieve acceleration data . tag_files character vector file paths associated specified tag ID. archive_path path archive file (applicable). immersion Logical indicating whether read immersion data (default TRUE).

title: Load acceleration data for a specific tag — load_tag_acc_data
text: data frame containing acceleration data POSIXct date_time column acceleration measurements.

title: Load acceleration data for a specific tag — load_tag_acc_data
code: load_tag_acc_data("61029", "path/to/archive", immersion = TRUE) #> Warning: No acceleration data file found for tag 61029 #> NULL

what: Find all compatible GPS data files in a directory structure — open_gps_data_files

text: function searches specified root directory subdirectories GPS data files match expected naming patterns. can handle loose files files contained within archive formats .zip .7z.

text: root_dir root directory start searching .

title: Find all compatible GPS data files in a directory structure — open_gps_data_files
text: list lists, containing data frames specific tag: acc_immersion_data: data frame containing acceleration data immersion information. acc_data: data frame containing acceleration data without immersion information. pos_data: data frame containing position data. diag_data: data frame containing diagnostics information.

title: Find all compatible GPS data files in a directory structure — open_gps_data_files
